variants.Description in input context: G2019S variant linked to familial Parkinson's disease
R1441C variant associated with Parkinson's disease
R1441G variant linked to Parkinson's disease

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with LRRK2 variants and wild-type constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of LRRK2 at S1292 in G2019S-expressing cells compared to wild-type.
Enhanced kinase activity in R1441C-expressing cells.
R1441G variant showed higher phosphorylation levels than wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels within 15% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels exceeding 30% of wild-type control.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing LRRK2 variants were used.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S-expressing cells showed 2.5-fold higher kinase activity than wild-type.
R1441C-expressing cells exhibited 1.8-fold increased kinase activity.
R1441G-expressing cells showed 1.4-fold higher kinase activity.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 20% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 40% of wild-type control.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with LRRK2 variants and stained for autophagy markers.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S-expressing cells showed 30% reduction in LC3B puncta compared to wild-type.
R1441C-expressing cells exhibited 25% reduction in LC3B puncta.
R1441G-expressing cells showed 20% reduction in LC3B puncta.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LC3B puncta levels within 10% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LC3B puncta levels below 30% of wild-type control.

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts from Parkinson's disease patients were treated with LRRK2 inhibitors.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S-expressing fibroblasts showed 20% lower viability after inhibitor treatment.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type fibroblasts were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated fibroblasts were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability within 5% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability below 15% of wild-type control.
